title: Rebar Weight Calculator | Construction Materials Tool

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Cross‑sectional area of a circular bar: A = \frac{\pi}{4}\,d^{2} Unit weight (mass per unit length): w = A \cdot \rho = \frac{\pi}{4}\,d^{2}\,\rho where d is diameter in meters, \rho is steel density (kg/m³), and results in kg/m. Common engineering shortcuts (equivalent): w\,[\mathrm{kg/m}] \approx 0.006165 \cdot d_{\mathrm{mm}}^{2} w\,[\mathrm{lb/ft}] \approx 0.167 \cdot \#^{2} (US bar sizes)
